title: Smart Student Risk Prediction
description: Designing a predictive model to identify students at risk of dropping out.Addresses real-time engagement issues in virtual education.

title: Personal Finance Manager
description: Developed a full-stack finance tracking app with JWT authentication and CRUD operations. Integrated category-wise expense tracking and visual analytics using Chart.js.

title: Research Paper Manager
description: Built a web app with login & file upload features for managing faculty research papers. Implemented MongoDB filtering and responsive UI for better usability.

title: Crop Recommendation System
description: Built predictive models for data analysis and Conducted data cleaning, preprocessing and visualization to enhance insights.
